hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT DISTINCT EODR.EODR_ID, EODR.CREATOR, EODR.CREATE_TIME, EODR.MODIFIER, EODR.MODIFY_TIME, EODR.REC_VER, EODR.REC_STATUS, EODR.ORG_ID, EODR.EODR_SEQUENCE, EODR.EODR_DIVIDE_CODE, EODR.EODR_DIVIDE_NAME, EODR.EODR_DIVIDE_RULE, EODR.EODR_STOCK_CHECK_RULE, EODR.EODR_IS_AUTO_IN , EODR.EODR_IN_ORDER_TYPE_CODE , EODR.EODR_IN_ORDER_TYPE_NAME, EODR.EODR_IS_AUTO_OUT, EODR.EODR_OUT_ORDER_TYPE_CODE, EODR.EODR_OUT_ORDER_TYPE_NAME, EODR.EODR_REMARK, EODR.TIME_ZONE, EODR.PM_CODE, EODR.EODR_EODP_PM_CODE FROM EO_DIVIDE_STOCK_RULE EODR LEFT JOIN EO_DIVIDE_STOCK_PARAM EODP ON EODP.ORG_ID = EODR.ORG_ID AND EODR.EODR_EODP_PM_CODE = EODP.PM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND EODR.EODR_EODP_PM_CODE IS NOT NULL <<AND EODR.ORG_ID =:orgId>> <<AND EODR.EODR_EODP_PM_CODE = :eodrEodpPmCode>> <<AND EODR.EODR_EODP_PM_CODE IN (:eodpPmCodes)>> /*按升序排序：涉及逻辑判断*/ ORDER BY EODR.EODR_SEQUENCE ASC
